commentary: The strife portfolio does still exist. Sometimes I have to remind people that things still exist, because so many things exist, and just because you forget about them doesn't mean they stop existing. A few characters have multiple allocations naturally, like Equius. Roxy is another player who has fistkind, and she also happens to be a Void player like him. Is there something to be said for Void players being naturally inclined toward fighting empty-handed? Whoops, I just made Homestuck scholars around the world throw years of research in the trash.
